Anatomy class 14301700 Unravelling the Gatekeepers



Investment2400SEK for the whole weekend 2000SEK for Anatomy Class bundle no yoga

‚Äç

Hip Joint and Related Postures

Looks at the construction of the hip joint and how individuals may differ the muscles around the joint and how they will influence movements in certain directions So many yoga postures involve a certain degree of freedom in the hips and sometimes it can be hard to determine what is stopping us reaching our desired position Practical exploration of groups of postures under the headings of forward folding hip rotations and hip abadductions will allow students to discover where they need to focus their attention and how to effectively work on increasing the ranges of motion Postures commonly used for exploration include Baddha Konasana Butterfly Upavishta Konasana widelegged forward fold Squatting Paschimottanasana seated forward fold Firelog and Virasana variations Heros pose We will also consider how many postures may fall unbeknown into the category of forward folding and explain what will be the likely expression of restriction

‚Äç

Arm Balance Workshop

Arm balances can be fun and exciting to play with even if they are not part of your normal practice They build strength coordination and focus but they can also put pressure on the wrists and shoulders if we are not ready for them In this workshop we will take ananatomical look at the skills proficiencies and ROM we require before exploring the technical detail of how to perform the different arm balances There will be a large percentage of practical experimentation with the exact content being tailored to suit the general ability of the class

‚Äç

Spine SI joint Backbending and Twists

It is not uncommon for students to feel a degree of discomfort when performing backbends or when embarking on taking on some of the more challenging foot behind head postures By understanding the construction of the spine and the surrounding muscles it becomes evident as to the types of movements that it is designed to perform in certain areas as well as the potential mechanism of injury We clarify the common spinal injuries such as herniated and bulging discs as well as discuss the possible causes of SI Joint pain The groups of postures discussed and explored practically are backbends and twists and the importance of the integration of movements at other major joints of hips and shoulders will be demonstrated We will endeavour to during the course of the workshop to allow students to determine where their own restrictions are and how to work with them For those students that feel they are already too mobile we will look at how to build strength and stability

‚Äç

Unravelling the Gatekeepers
In Ashtanga Yoga there are particular postures that are often referred to as ‚Äògatekeepers‚Äô because they frequently halt the progression through the series of even the most enthusiastic and determined student In other styles as well there would be postures in any given sequence that might be considered peak postures providing extra challenges for the student Presupposing that the student has the technical knowledge to perform the particular posture sometimes the difficulty is a strength thing sometimes a missing range of motion ROM or easily a combination of both maybe balance or even fear enter into the equation In this workshop we single out some of the more tricky postures such as Bujipidasana Marichyasana B  D Supta Kurmasana and Pasasana as vehicles for understanding how to deconstruct difficult postures into understand able elements that can then be worked on individually or used as the basis for sensible lead in sequencing If time allows we will also open up the discussion to include postures being worked on by individuals at the workshop Of course what will be a peak posture for one person might not present much challenge at all for another depending on their individual make up Exploration of these more difficult postures allows you to better understand where your restrictions and weakness might be as they are less easily accommodated or avoided in these situations

‚Äç

‚ÄçAbout Camilla
Camilla is Authorized by Manju Pattabhi Jois to teach Ashtanga Vinyasa Yoga 1st and 2nd series She adds calmness warmth and focus where there is an intention to highlight the strength you already possess Camilla has many years of experience in yoga teaching primarily Ashtanga Vinyasa Yoga since 17 years She has also had groups in meditation stress management and personal development for several years and has a university degree in behavioral science Camilla has had the blessing to practice with the whole Jois family and have a deep understanding of the Patanjali Yoga Sutras She has also released a Meditation CD

About Johan

Johan is Authorized by Manju Pattabhi Jois to teach Ashtanga Vinyasa Yoga 1st and 2nd series Johan is wellliked for his sensitive hands and clear guidance With his background as an Ayurvedic Health Adviser he has a deep understanding of our various constitutions Vata Pitta and Kapha and how to deal with them differently on the yoga mat to find their balance and come closer to their inner true nature Johan has also been a teacherstudent of John Scott and has studied Ayurveda under Dr David Frawley and the American Institute of Vedic Studies

Johan and Camilla are both close students of Manju Jois and learn from him and his vast knowledge of the Ashtanga Yoga System continuously which he has practiced for 65 years Together with Manju they Released a book on Yoga Chikitsa Yoga Therapy in 2016

THEM
THEM is a GermanUS act that brings the sound of King Diamond the uniqueness of Mercyful Fate and the technical perfection of Nevermore  Alongside of a powerful show that will blow everyone away this will for sure be the live experience of 2017
After recording some songs and a video on You Tube the band was signed to the Belgian record label Empire Records In 2015 they released a three song EP called Fear Them and did a North American tour with Helloween  In September 2016 THEM released SWEET HOLLOW the first full length album of the band

httpswwwyoutubecomwatchv8QugNxgFQeU
httpswwwyoutubecomwatchvnQJA8JBP1dM

Pectora

From the country that gave us bands like King Diamond Pretty Maids and Volbeat comes the newcomers of hard hitting melodic Danish heavy metal Pectora

Since the formation of the band in 2011 Roskilde based Pectora have released the demo Burgeon Of Hate in 2014 and the EP Redemption in 2017 All of them leading up to their bombastic debut album Untaken to be released through Mighty Music in May 2019

Untaken is produced by the band and mixed and mastered by one of Germanys leading produceres Orden Ogans Sebastian Seeb Levermann Orden Ogan Rhapsody Of Fire Riot V  Brainstorm in Greenman Studios

Its an album rich on full blown heavy metal from start to finish Wrapped up in a modern and big prodution Pectora shows that heavy metal in 2019 still is an active force where old school and new school heavy metal collides and melt together in the best possible way

The 8 tracks on Untaken showcases a band that knows how to write powerful songs with strong riffs memorable melodies harmonies and bombastic singalong choruses that stick to your brain
If you are a fan of classic metal thrash power or hard rock and if you like your music fast heavy and slow  Pectora is what you are looking for

Pectora will tour Sweden as support for US metallers THEM in May 2019 as well as playing shows in Denmark and Germany See full tour below more shows TBA

Untaken will be released on CD LP  digital on May 3rd

Moving With Ease
A special workshop to explore body movement in our yoga practice When we practice yoga we are shifting into movement that creates a healthy relationship between the body and the mind where all parts of ourselves are allowed time to become present

We will practice moving with grace reaching and grasping asana initiated by our limb and senses This feeling can release a tremendous amount of energy so we are able to do much more with much less By having this approach we let stress go from our bodies and mind and teaches us to handle challenge with ease

It is the accessible workshop where we learn simple positions in safe and supportive environment

All you need to do is to bring your body explore your boundaries enjoy and have fun

Instruction is in English

Wear comfortable clothing and bring a yoga mat  then get ready to explore yourself

It is a small group class with maximum 10 participants

 Yoga mat is also available in the studio but you can bring your own if you want

EveNamn: Youth Exchange In our power Social sustainability  community
EveBesk:
Youth Exchange In our power Social sustainability  community
The current mainstream modern culture is leaving many people isolated Numbers in depression and loneliness are increasing

Indigenous and intentional communities around the world have been working on creating a healthy social fabric for dealing resiliently with inevitable changes ecosocial and economic pressures and conflict

In this time together we will explore the tools skills and practices that involve creating healthy social bonds develop clear and responsible communication transform conflict and foster authentic freeing relationships with ourselves others and the world We call this regenerative social skills

Come and explore how you can enrich your personal life and communicate more effectively collaborate more artfully with others and explore new levels of intimacy and connection

The exchange will take place in √Ñngsbacka community in Sweden so we can get in contact with examples of lifestyle of voluntary simplicity and minimalism personal growth life in a rural area social and green business

Costs are refunded by Erasmus 

Apply by February 18 2019 on httpbitdoYEAB2019

Organized by Angsbacka NEXTGEN Europe Coyote Initiatives GEN Finland RIE Lakab√© Yes to Sustainability Erasmus

Officiell hashtag Overthinkingtour

Sacred Womb  Womens Festival
Theme 2019 Bridging Worlds
We invite you into the open space between the different aspects of womanhood Our intention is to strengthen all those bridges that we might feel separate us from each other or even cause separation within our own lives Motherhood and Sexuality Career and True Purpose Support and Comparison Spirituality and everyday reality

We will explore the integration of all those paths so that the inner and the outer can come into harmony We will look into how we are limiting ourselves by thinking if we have one of those things we can not have the other Life moves in cycles ‚Äì feeding one dream at a time does not mean we have to forever let go of others

We are inspired to build true Community ‚Äì a space where all of our dreams can be seen heard and fed We wish to inspire each other to own our different unique precious voices to step out there and take decisive action towards the life we dream about

Feminine leadership is about protecting Life and all that is sacred It is about finding new connections about the ability to dance with all those different harmonies and presenting them to the world as music Whether business woman tantrika or single mother maiden or grandmother we are all weavers of the Web of Life We can all open new bridges towards each other and the world

Let‚Äôs cross those bridges together into true inspiration unity and support

Gyllene Hoppet 2019

EveNamn: 16 Guidelines for Life Level 1 Workshop with Wendy Ridley
EveBesk:
16 Guidelines for Life Level 1 Workshop with Wendy Ridley
httpsyeshenorbuseevent16guidelineslevel1workshop

This innovative 2day workshop explores universal values that can empower you to lead a happy meaningful life The idea is simple to change the way we experience the world we transform the way we think act and relate to others to find meaning

We will explore key attitudes for developing a mindful culture in our family and community in education healthcare or business The focus will be on mindfulness enquiry and ethics using the 16 Guidelines 16G 16 Guidelines is a tried and tested experiential course with activities discussion presentations and video clips

In a relaxed enjoyable and supportive environment you will be introduced to practical daily tools designed to

Increase emotional resilience and confidence
Build positive relationships and communities
Achieve a greater sense of wellbeing and purpose
Each course participant is provided with 16 Guidelines book and 16 Guidelines cars for further practice

Who is this Workshop for

The 16 Guidelines Level 1

is suitable for people of any background all faiths and cultural traditions
provides a framework and practical set of tools which can be used on a daily basis by participants to develop the culture of the good heart
can be a catalyst for community activities such as a children‚Äôs or a youth group or in local prisons hospices or schools
It is particularly ideal for

 Teachers and carers or those in support roles
 Coaches and psychologists
 Those who work in business environments
 Anyone seeking practical tools to bring about positive change in their life

Level 1 Workshop provides an introduction to the 16G so it is suited for those new to the 16G as well as anyone wishing to deepen their understanding of them or for those intending to become accredited 16G trainers After the workshop your practice can be supported by our app book and cards But more importantly we will organize Building on Basics followon study sessions that has been designed to commence after a 16G Level 1 workshop providing participants with an opportunity to integrate their experience and understanding of the 16G into everyday life Experience has shown that this is also a very helpful way to enjoy ongoing support and a sense of 16G community

We have a special price for teachers If you wish to participate or know teachers school or university teachers who are interested in mindfulness and wish to learn the tools for selfcare please let us know at zarinayeshenorbuse or call 073 992 30 83

About the facilitator

Wendy has over 30 years experience working in education ‚Äì as a teacher university lecturer education department advisor and education consultant This has provided her with skills and passion to develop deliver and oversee training programmes Wendy is influenced by studying and practicing meditation with various wellrespected teachers After meeting Lama Yeshe she was inspired by his vision of Universal Education Wendy is on the Board of FDCW is a Senior 16G Facilitator and has done many retreats

httpwww16guidelinesorg

Raw Fermentation
Workshop
Raw Fermentation
Monday 2752019 kl18002030
Welcome to our workshop on Raw Fermentation
Fermented foods are some of the most nutrient dense foods you can eat and the technique of fermentation is one of the oldest food preservation methods known to man In The Raw Kitchen fermentation is one of the three key elements we use to transform our basic ingredients into delicious healthy dishes
In this workshop we will teach you how to make fermented drinks fruits vegetables and yoghurts so you can easily implement them into your everyday diet at home The workshop will include theory as well as practical elements and you will get to make your own ferments that you will take home with you

Welcome to a weekend in the name of LOVE
MyYoganess offered this retreat last spring and on request we offer it again mid May this time at S√∂rby Retreat centre

This is a weekend where you could come as an individual but maybe even more powerful  together with someone that you have some kind of relationship Could be partners parent sibling child or why not a dear friend Last year we even had a whole family joining ‚ô•

The retreat will include yoga suitable for all levels of experience meditation dancing singing rituals and practices to nurture sweetness love and relationship We will share exercises to deepen the relationship to different dimensions of yourself but also between you and another

Our intention with this retreat is to offer a beautiful and unique opportunity for someone in your life to understand more about yoga and the yogic lifestyle and why it is important to you And you will get an opportunity to deepen your relationship and connection while also treating yourself a weekend of recharging and boosting LOVE in all dimensions

Welcome to Iyengar Yoga Immersion with Alexander Borovik

Yoga In The Tradition Of BKS Iyengar
In this kind of teaching special attention is paid to the anatomical orientation of the body in the asanas Props such as blocks blankets rolls chairs belts ropes and wall can be used for various purposes increase or diminish the intensity of an asana to place the focus of the asana to compensate for physical flexibility or stiffness and practice in a therapeutic approach Also inverted postures like headstand and shoulder stand passive poses and final relaxation Savasana are essential elements of the class structure In a sequence of a class both the relaxing and the activating nervous system are stimulated in a balanced way

Link to
wwwfacebookcomyogoa
wwwyogoaru



HIP OPENING
During this workshop we will become aware of the different movement directions of the hip joint and will learn to mobilise and stabilise the hip in a healthy way

We will focus our work on the different femur rotations and will increase the mobility of the hip joint with different stretches


INVERSIONS
In Iyengar yoga the inversions are an important part of a balance practice

Regular practice of Inversions especially Sirsasana and Salamba Sarvangasana has many benefits to our body and mind They improve blood circulation regulate our nervous and endocrine systems and have a beneficial effect on managing stress

In this workshop we will prepare our body to inversions strengthening the core and the pelvic muscles shoulders and arms You will learn to practice handstand elbow balance headstand and shoulderstand in a safe way for your body and improve your alignement in those poses


BACKBENDS
In this workshop we will focus on Backbends and prepare the body for it by mobilising the spine opening the armpitchest and pelvicgroin area so that the lumbar spine stays safe during the practice Backbends when done properly bring us into the present energising both body and mind




ABOUT ALEXANDER BOROVIK
Alex was born in 1970 near Nuremberg in Germany Via Vipassana Meditation and Aikido he came to Iyengar Yoga in 2002 After completing his training as a certified yoga teacher in the tradition of BKS Iyengar Sebastian Kneipp Academy he went to India where he deepened his knowledge of Iyengar Yoga RIMYI  Pune Usha Devi Rudra  Rishikesh Dr Karandikar  Pune Dr Abhay Keste  Belgaum

Since 2008 Alex has been living in Goa in India where he is teaching in his studio regular classes workshops and retreats In the SpringSummer he‚Äôs traveling around Europe teaching workshops and retreats

In his classes Alex uses knowledge of Iyengar Yoga biomechanics and yoga therapy which allows him to easily teach students of various levels body types and with different health problems Alex will inspire you to go deeper in your yoga practice and to get the full benefit out of the poses using when needed the perfect set up for your body

EveNamn: The Upcycle Toolbox upcycling and embroidery
EveBesk:
The Upcycle Toolbox upcycling and embroidery
From ancient history to modern day embroidery is an art deeply rooted in culture and tradition During this workshop we will embrace its roots and branch out exploring how we can use embroidery to renew refresh and bring a sense of originality to cast away textile items and garments

We will begin the workshop searching for inspiration and learning where to look for it We will then move onto learning the basics of embroidery followed by how to apply it to unloved items to give them a new lease of life Then for the best part it‚Äôs time for you to put your new skills into action

The workshop can be held in both English and Swedish We will adjust to the attendees needs

HOST Becca Edwards ‚Äì Upcycledesigner and textilsl√∂jdl√§rare
COHOST Luzia Buchmann

COST 300 kr plus optional cost of materials

Material and tools will be available for purchase on the day Entirely optional and payable via swish or cash

TAKE WITH YOU  Tools If you have the full kit great bring it along If you only have a sewing needle great bring it along‚Ä¶ if you don‚Äôt have any of the tools needed don‚Äôt worry We have tools you can borrow and you can even choose to purchase at the end of the workshop

Materials Bring along some unloved textile items you would like to embroider If you don‚Äôt have anything then we will provide a few second hand items which will be avilable for purchase

Kravallen 2019
Missa inte det fetaste eventet Save the date mer information kommer senare

Design for Inclusion  Bootcamp
A CITY FOR EVERYONE
Join us to make Stockholm a more inclusive city During an intense oneweek experience you will work together with students from a variety of disciplines and cultures to design and prototype solutions that include everyone

Through a variety of fieldtrips and cultural excursions you will meet entrepreneurs and other experts in technology culture and design while working closely with students from Babson College Take the chance to expand your creative capacity learn how to cope with uncertainty and develop ideas with a humancentered approach

In order to be eligible you must be a student or alumni of one of our member universities KTH SSE Konstfack SU or KI

ABOUT BABSON COLLEGE
Babson College is a private business school in Wellesley Massachusetts established in 1919 Its central focus is on entrepreneurship education and it is often ranked the most prestigious entrepreneurship college in the United States

NB
All participants are expected to attend all days and daytime sessions All materials and lectures will be conducted in in English

DEADLINE
Applications are open until March 15 1200 pm noon

All vikings aboard the biggest international student event in Europe

Set sail with thousands of likeminded students across the Baltic Sea as you discover a whole new world beyond the horizon
The 27th edition is awaiting you what stories will you bring back home

More info about the event below



WHAT IS ESN SEA BATTLE

The ESN Sea Battle is an international cruise between Stockholm Sweden and Riga Latvia

The event is organised by ESN Sweden and is attended by 1800 international students from 4 ESN countries ESN Denmark ESN Norway ESN UK and ESN Sweden Twice a year the biggest ESN event in Europe uniting students from multiple countries on one cruise ship rocking the Baltic Sea

Experience two European capitals Stockholm and Riga and feel like a true viking wandering through the old town of these cities while stepping on the stones of history You will Rave The Sea while crossing over with the ship and experience Multiple Dance Floors and Bars Live Shows Karaoke Salsa Dance lessons Sauna Treasure hunts competitions sightseeing and much more

To get the full ESN Sea Battle experience book your ticket to an exclusive walking tour in Stockholm or Riga

Included in the price

Two nights in a shared cabin
One buffet dinner All you can eat  drink
Access to all the activities and parties
ESN Sea Battle goodie bag bracelet and tshirt

You get 100SEK discount with the ESNcard Make sure it is registered at httpsesncardorg at least 24h BEFORE you make your booking

Prices
 Single ticket in a 2persons cabin 1100SEK with ESNcard 1000SEK
 Single ticket in a 4persons cabin 1000SEK with ESNcard 900SEK
 Whole 2persons cabin 1900SEK with ESNcard 1700SEK
 Whole 4persons cabin 3600SEK with ESNcard 3200SEK

Dates
 15th May Departure from Stockholm to Riga
 16th May Arrival to Riga  Departure from Riga to Stockholm
 17th May Arrival to Stockholm

Departure from Stockholm 1700
Arrival in Riga on the 16th of May 1000 SWEDISH TIME

Tuesday 16th May Riga  Stockholm
Departure from Riga 1630 SWEDISH TIME
Arrival in Stockholm on the 17th of May 1030


THE BOARDING CLOSES 30 MINUTES PRIOR TO DEPARTURE  It will be necessary to arrive at the harbour between 11001400 local time please contact your local section as well


INFO The boat is wheelchair accessible send an email to supportseabattlese in addition to your booking Strobe lights occur during the evening programme

Party Picknick Pub  PPP  Heldagen 2019
Tenorens last event for the semester and lets end it with a bang PPP is a recurring event that happens once a year to celebrate the end of the school year and the start of the summer

A whole day where the bar is open from 11 oclock until 2 at night with activties throughout the day and end the day with dancing at Tenoren During the whole day we will have some special prices in the bar

There will be a little bit of everything to make sure the day is perfect
Dont forget to sign up your team for BeerPong and the activities last day to sign up is on the 24th of May

Between 1720 we will be serving taco buffet for 50kr

VIS Iceland Trip
Come and explore the land of ice and fire Iceland will show you landscapes that you have never seen before in the nordic nations This small island in the middle of the Northern Atlantic is famous for it‚Äôs natural wonders Check out the famous Eyjafjallaj√∂kull volcano relax in the Blue Lagoon and walk around in the northernmost capital of the world

Guided activities

GOLDEN CIRCLE
A guided bus ride will take you away from Reykjavik to explore the countryside and the famous Golden Circle Here you will see the Geysir Strokkur walk up to the Gullfoss waterfall with a 32 meter drop and visit √ûingvellir National Park The national park is an UNESCO World Heritage site and the place where the first Viking parliament was held √ûingvellir also happens to be situated on the fissure zone of the MidAtlantic Ridge where Iceland is growing

BLUE LAGOON 85‚Ç¨
The Blue Lagoon geothermal spa is located in the lava fields in Grindav√≠k on the Reykjanes Peninsula The water temperature is a relaxing 3740 degrees centigrade all year round During the two hour stay you have time to walk around the pool and feel the temperature change visit the natural saunas and make a silica face mask The price includes transportation and the entrance ticket

SOUTH SHORE ADVENTURE FROM 85 EUR
The guided bus trip will take you on a trip along the south coast Passing by the world famous Eyjafjallaj√∂kull which erupted in 2010 and caused chaos all over the world You will have a chance to walk behind the Seljalandsfoss waterfall and walk up to the Skogafoss waterfall You will see the black beaches alongside the coast and visit the black beach at Reynisfjara with the mysterious basalt rock formations The bus will take you all the way to the small town of V√≠k the southernmost town in Iceland before taking you back to Reykjavik

The sludgy and metallic hardcore band Horndal tells the true horror story about the devil‚Äôs extermination of their hometown Their debut EP recorded by Steve Albini was released 2017 Debut fulllength out Feb 22nd on Prosthetic Records

Horndal is or was a small industrial town in the Swedish woods In the late seventies the steel mill that employed almost the entire population was threatened with closure To protest against this a local theatre group wrote and performed a play about this disastrous event The story portrays the devil coming to shut down the steel mill leave the exploited factory workers to their fate and send the community to an early grave Sadly the story came true The factory was closed and the town left for dead Long live Horndal

Jambo is a multidisciplinary practitioner with special interests in biomechanics and psychospiritual practices He is one of the few selected Forrest Yoga Guardians who share the teachings of Forrest Yoga practices as close to their original form Jambo‚Äôs method of teaching is fun and very light with the idea that we need these qualities in order to work with our shadows effectively His style is deliberately memorable and he enjoys to work with the injuries that are in the room so that we all learn in real time

VIS goes ESN Sea Battle
Vikings listen up
Its time for the 27th edition of ESN Sea Battle

Note that the official event for ESN Sea Battle can be found here
httpswwwfacebookcomevents330343377688786

This event will just provide additional information for participants joining from V√§xj√∂ 

Ticket sale opens on the 3rd of March 2000
When buying a ticket make sure that you choose the correct ESN sectioncity which is ESN V√§xj√∂V√§xj√∂ in your case 

There are different types of tickets you can get
You can either buy a single ticket in either a 2 or 4person cabin Later on you can state preferences with whom you want to be matched but there is no guarantee
You can also buy a ticket for an entire either 2person or 4person cabin In this case youll fill out all your name and send your friends the booking code so that they can sign themselves up with the same code
Youll get a discount of 100 SEK for having a valid ESNcard the card you got as proof of your VIS membership Just register that card at wwwesncardorg before trying to purchase the ticket

You want to travel to Sea Battle and back together with your friends and the participants from V√§xj√∂
We got you covered  You can also get a bus ticket for the transportation from V√§xj√∂ to Stockholm and back directly when buying your Sea Battle ticket online The price is 360 SEK for transportation for both ways

To get more information about the ticket categories and to purchase a ticket please check out the official event mentioned above

The regular Sea Battle ticket includes
 your bed in a cabin or the entire cabin depending on the ticket category
 a buffet with lots of food and drinks on the first night
 amazing performances on stage plus a lot of social activities like dancing classes quizzes treasure hunts speed friending neon face painting etc
 a goodie bag and a Sea Battle TShirt
 amazing parties

For more information check out the official event

Urban OMs Level 1 Yoga Alliance Registered 200 hr Yoga Teacher Training provides tools for selftransformation as well as the skills and practical experience to teach yoga in individual and group settings in an anatomically informed respectful and sensitive way Learn from an international faculty of yoga experts and be well equipped to apply the powerful tools of yoga techniques breathing and meditation in a variety of settings

COME JOIN US ON OUR INFO TALKS
1730  1900 14 August

Highlights
 Limited places to ensure maximum student attention
 Membership included from the day you sign up
 International expert faculty offering no fuss teaching gems
Modular approach allowing you to take this training alongside normal work
 Residential intensive for immersive learning
 Get in to the body and have fun whilst gaining valuable professional and leadership skills
 Extensive practical experience observing assisting  teaching
 Mentoring  peer support for collaborative cocreative and reflective learning
 Training registered with Yoga Alliance at the 200 hours leve
 Foundation level training preparing you for Yoga Therapy Teacher Training Level 2 STARTING 2019

Certification
Assessment is ongoing throughout the course which means that you are being observed how you take on board the teachings that have been shared and how your new embodied understanding is reflected in your yoga practice your life and your teaching All students are required to participate in all aspects and classes of the course and complete all assigned precourse reading and assignments as well as all homework given during the course You will get challenges between modules to deepen you transformation connected with yoga philosophy such as building a home practice gratitude work rituals and more

All days are full days of training timings varies depending on module but they always stretch from morning to evening

I uttryckande konstterapi integreras kunskaper fr√•n en psykodynamisk m√§nniskosyn med en grundsyn att det √§r m√∂tet relationen och samspelet mellan tv√• eller flera m√§nniskor som st√•r i fokus Den existentiella psykoterapin har √§ven en central plats H√§r betonas betydelsen av att unders√∂ka livsvillkoren sj√§lva existensens natur och utmaning samt √∂ka sin f√∂rm√•ga att ta ansvar f√∂r sina v√§gval och s√∂ka upp det som ger livet mening och inneh√•ll De konstn√§rligt inriktade metoderna kan √§ven anv√§ndas i olika pedagogiska och socialpedagogiska sammanhang och i arbete med ledarskap och organisation I arbetet anv√§nder man olika konstn√§rliga spr√•kuttryck  musik bild dans och r√∂relse drama teater lyrik och prosa samt sagor myter och ber√§ttelser I dag finns tex olika program i uttryckande konst som anv√§nds i integreringsarbetet med ensamkommande flyktingbarn eller i samspel immigranter och inf√∂dda svenskar

Uttryckande konstterapi √§r en terapimetod som utg√•r fr√•n att det inom varje m√§nniska finns en naturlig skaparf√∂rm√•ga och att hon genom eget skapande och konstn√§rliga upplevelser kan b√§ttre f√∂rst√• och bearbeta sin historia s√∂ka mening √∂ka f√∂rm√•gan till samspel och p√•verka sin utveckling Arbetsformen √§r b√•de verbal och icke verbal och h√§r ing√•r √§ven kroppsinriktade metoder

May 10th12th

‚ÄúCROSSING THE RAINBOW BRIDGE‚Äù YIN YOGA  MEDITATION WORKSHOP with Anouk teaching in English

Crossing the Rainbow Bridge
During an indulging and relaxing weekend workshop 3 days we will cross the Rainbow Bridge We will embark on a colorful journey through the chakras the energy centers of our subtle body by a rich combination of chakra theory and Yin Yoga  Meditation practice

The Rainbow Bridge is mythical metaphor for the development of human existence Each of the seven chakras corresponds with a color of the rainbow Each color indicates one of the seven stages of consciousness that we humans can reach Returning to the myth of the Rainbow bridge allows us to reestablish and deepen our connection to our own essence and enables us to places the inner work we do within a broader whole

During this workshop we aim for a deeper understanding of our chakra system and how it affects our lives so that we‚Äôll be able to identify imbalances in our lives more easily Over the course of the weekend we will cover some basic chakra theory and indulge in Yin Yoga  Meditation practice Anouk will guide you through these practices with the aim to offer you simple toolstechniques to connect to your energy system and balance the chakras With a deeper understanding of the workings of the chakras we are more capable of balancing our lives and to welcoming opportunities for healing personal growth and transformation

This workshop is open and accessible to all beginning as well as more experienced yin yogis are super welcome to join

ABOUT ANOUK
Anouk is a certified Yin Yoga teacher originally from Amsterdam The Netherlands She nowadays lives in Helsinki and works and teaches mainly in Finland She is passionate about Yin Yoga and devoted to sharing the teachings from Paul Grilley with as many souls as possible
She completed her Yin Yoga  Chakra Study teacher training RYT 200 in Amsterdam NL with Anat Geiger Johan Noorloos and Marcel van de Vis Heil To deepen her knowledge of the functional anatomy in Yin Yoga she soon after completed her Yin Yoga  Anatomy Immersion RYT 100 with Jos√© de Groot at Delight Yoga Amsterdam Her main teachers Anat and Jos√© have been senior assistants of Paul and Suzee Grilley for many years now
In her yoga classes she wishes to show people that yoga does not need to be fuzzy nor complicated but that yoga practice offers something to everyone and that with regular practice it can give you a more beautiful richer and more balanced life Anouk teaches in a manner that is open and accessible to everyone beginners and more advanced yogis Her classes are marked by softness a lot of individual care and attention and sufficient space to explore and push your physical as well as mental boundaries in a very gentle way With her Yin Yoga classes Anouk hopes to give her students inspiration and courage to bring the principles of Yin Yoga off the mat and into real life as that is where our real yoga practice begins
Anouk also works as a Life Coach Yoga Therapist Chakra Reader  Reiki Healer

Destination Atalante is Atalante‚Äôs new venue for artists and audiences in performing arts music movies text and visual arts Four nights during the spring Niklas Ryd√©n Saga Bj√∂rklund J√∂nsson and Amanda Nordmark will invite artists from different art fields to talk about their work show excerpts from pieces in progress and discuss current issues in the art area We will also invite representatives of cultural policy and other key persons to highlight the conditions of culture in Gothenburg
When you go to Destination Atalante you never know what to expect Is there a concert in the foyer a whole performance on stage talks about a work in progress cultural policy debate stage improvisations film show new circus or an artist presentation Or even all at the same time ‚Ä¶

Destination Atalante puts meeting and the conversation between artists artists and audiences in focus and wants to encourage crossborder innovation what is being created and inspire new collaborations

Anatomi and Alignment Course
Anatomy and Alignment course  Reconnect and heal your body

Can you feel all of your body Can you sense its position in space Can you feel what all of your parts are doing Can you feel when you are in alignment Do you know what that is for you Can you move each part of you independently of the other parts Are you connected or disconnected

In this anatomy and alignment course you will learn how to align yourself to improve function movement and health and how to prevent or heal injuries
You will learn to feel your body from the inside out Names of muscles are not that important if you can‚Äôt place them or feel them in your own body
Good body alignment is not a single posture or position Neither is it the same for everyone Rather it is that for every possible position for every body there is a perfect alignment When you find this alignment it allows for the circulation of vital energy or prana blood lymph and other fluids to find an optimal healthy flow Just like a garden hose where all bends have been straighten out water flows unobstructed The body knows instinctively the correct alignment but often is not strong flexible or mobile enough or you are not aware enough to put yourself into this alignment Alignment isn‚Äôt the same as a line its not stationary or fixed Rather alignment is how we come alive in our bodies comfortable and expressive in our own skin
In order for the alignment knowledge to make sense we will cover basic anatomy with an emphasis on feeling the bones joints and muscles rather than just knowing their names from a picture in a book Our approach will be more of an embodied physical sense on how everything is related and interconnected

This course is for everybody and it will provide you with a firm foundation in how to selfobserve and measure how you are currently moving so you can change it if necessary
You will learn what you need to work on and you will get the tools to fix yourself

Afterwards you can apply this knowledge to yourself or if you are a yoga teacher personal trainer physiotherapist massage therapist or other movement specialist even to your students clients or patients If you work with movement and health this innovative approach can round out even the most established exercise toolbox
You can also take this course just for your own health and wellbeing

Module 1 Lower body ‚Äì Feet knees legs and hips
Move your lower body for more strength and mobility and less discomfort or limitations
We will cover basic anatomy in relations to feet knees legs and hips from an embodied perspective Its more useful to feel where the bones joints and muscles are rather than know their names in a book
We will also cover common misalignments in the lower body and provide you with a firm foundation in how to selfobserve and measures how you are currently moving in your lower body so you can change it in yourself or your students if necessary

When Sunday 28th April
Time 9001600
Teacher Thea Treppendahl
Where Yoga House Akademi
Price 1 module 1200 kr  all 3 modules 2995kr


Module 2 Upper body
Get away from the PC or Mac and open up your upper body for active painfree arms and mobile strong shoulders and neck
We will cover basic anatomy for the hands wrists elbows arms shoulders neck and upper back from an embodied perspective Its more useful to feel where the bones joints and muscles are rather than know their names in a book
We will also cover common misalignments in the upper body and provide you with a firm foundation in how to selfobserve and measures how you are currently moving in your upper body so you can change it if necessary

WHEN Sunday 12th May from 916
Time 9001600
Teacher Thea Treppendahl
Where Yoga House Akademi
Price 1 module 1200 kr  all 3 modules 2995kr


Module 3 Core diaphragm and pelvic floor
Create a strong and supple core able to carry you well through your daily activities
We will cover basic anatomy for the core diaphragm and pelvic floor from an embodied perspective Its more useful to feel where the bones joints and muscles are rather than know their names in a book
We will also cover common misalignments and provide you with a firm foundation in how to selfobserve and measures how you are currently moving so you can change it if necessary
In this final module we will concentrate on all things core pelvic floor diaphragm breathing and how it relates to everything else

WHEN Sunday 26th May from 916

Teacher Thea Treppendahl

Spring Game Jam 2019
A game jam is an event where programmers artists and gamers come together and create games both computer games and board games

Friday Schedule
1715  Ikshu Dutta will hold a Construct 3 workshop Construct 3 is a web based tool for creating 2D games It is a perfect introduction to game development
1800  Spring Game Jam starts

What do you do during a game jam
1 We start by generating a random theme from audience input
2 We sit down in groups and discuss game ideas from that theme
3 Pitch game ideas and form groups with other participants Our goal is to make sure everyone finds a group to work with and encourage people to work with people they do not know yet
4 Develop a prototype
5 We showcase the prototypes and play each other games

Everybody is welcome student and nonstudents alike No previous experience is needed and the event is free of charge

Event is held in Swedish or English depending on participants

More information and FAQ on httpliugamejamse

EveNamn: Gong  Sound training Sweden 2019 with Jens Zygar
EveBesk:
Gong  Sound training Sweden 2019 with Jens Zygar
description for a 5 day integral gong  sound work basic training

introduction  forward  preamble

This intense workshop covers touches many aspects of a contemporary sound healing activity targeting the spiritual wellness culture and initiating any individual personal transformational growth process

It enables the participants to understand and practise basic principles and profound protocols of a contemporary holistic sound healing

This certificated integral gong sound rhythm training with Jens Zygar is designed for everybody who wants to deepen his understanding of how to operate successfully professionally with healing sounds in self healing related circumstances The experience of this workshop can be looked upon as an effective personal growth module that features and strengthen sensitivity awareness and mind fullness This education can ground and inspire any professional acting as a integre spirit wellness activist

The teachings are conducted by Jens Zygar With over 30 years of active gong playing and working with integral sound healing he is one of the most experienced inspiring and interesting sound experts of our time His intention is to unveal and evolve personal potentials within the field of creative self expression He is also a true entertainer full of playfulness in his mission to expand our minds with his unique teachings This weekend is open to everyone with the slightest interest in how sounds can transform us and bring us to happiness You might never have touched a musical instrument or you might be a deeply experienced gong player ‚Äì either way this weekend will give you an abundance of new information and experience Since space is limited please book early to guarantee attendance Jens¬¥s workshops  lectures are serious and entertaining at the same time You can expect surprising things to happen Don¬¥t miss this edutaining event with one the worlds most experienced sound experts ‚Äú


‚ÄûSound is considered as being a very effective medium of transformation and realisation Simply by setting the vibrating resonance fields anyone can experience the effects of acoustic vibration on the personal body mind and spirit relation‚Äú Jens Zygar

You will get a serious knowledge base on a variety of sound instruments such as sound bowls gongs oblongs trigons sansulas drums and shakers The primary training consist on a step by step introduction to the core activity of any sensitive acting which is the synchronisation of once personal bioenergetical constellation with the chronobiological nature of existence

The training happens is based on personal dialogues and coaching advices and each participant will be looked at from an individual point of view It might integrate hidden aspects of once life setup into the masterplan of once own life

‚ÄûMy purpose is to introduce and share ideas insights concepts from my experience being a practical sound musical and trainertrainer as well for the benefit of all beings and the evolution of mankind towards world peace and cosmic expansion‚Äú jens zygar

Jens Zygar Biography

Jens Zygar started his life as a sound researcher back in 1984 in Hamburg Germany where he established the Klanghaus the Sound House an independent institute for the research and development of healing and performing arts He met Hans Cousto the founder of the Cosmic Octave and since then the journey through this exciting world full of audio phenomenon is still going on Focusing on the gongs as creators of maximum holistic sound that expands and evolves our perspective on the concerns of life Jens¬¥s workshops  lectures are serious and entertaining at the same time You can expect surprising things to happen Don¬¥t miss this edutaining event with one the worlds most experienced sound experts ‚Äú

The course is open to everyone but this particular course has bigger youth and student discounts as well as extra discount for LTH students as its arranged in cooperation with TLTHs dance courses

On this level we continue with polishing the basics set during the beginners weekend We will also work with the details that will improve the feel and look of your dancing

As this weekend has 8h of classes and the Bcourse as a full semester has 15h it is not equivalent of a full semester

NOTE This course picks up where the beginners weekend ended Thus you really need to take the beginners weekend or similar before taking this course

If you have taken beginners classes elsewhere please write a comment about this when you register

UPF Ball 2019
The days are getting brighter and spring is around the corner and with spring comes the event we‚Äôve all been waiting for  the annual UPF ball We hereby invite you to celebrate another successful year for the organization with a glamorous evening at Grand Hotel The night will start with a mingle followed by a three course dinner with live entertainment ballroom dancing and a spectacular after party

UPF  CFE  EUWeek
UPF  CFE  This Time Im Voting  EUWEEK
2026th of May

From the 23rd to the 26th of May 2019 European citizens across the Union will head to the polls to elect representatives to the European Parliament

Sometimes labelled the ‚Äúforgotten election‚Äù the EP election flies under the radar for most people This is very unfortunate given that as much as 60 to 70 of local and regional decisions are impacted by EU regulations What does the EU do And what policies are the Swedish parties pushing for

In an effort to create more awareness and elevate participation The Association of Foreign Affairs have teamed up with the Center for European Studies and the campaign ‚ÄúThis time I‚Äôm voting‚Äù in putting together a full week of events tackling issues relevant to the European Parliament Elections from different angles We want to give you all the information you¬¥ll need to make an informed decision on who will get your vote on May 26th

More detailed information on each event will be published ahead of the EU week

Monday 20th of May
Intro The European Parliament  The Elections
Anamaria DutceacSegesten researcher at the Center for European Studies will teach us the basics of how the EU works how the European Parliament is composed what type of issues it decides on and what groups the Swedish parties are a part of Markus Bonekamp head of the European Parliament‚Äôs office in Sweden will tell us about why it is important to vote

 Where  SOL
 When  1830
 Speakers  Anamaria DutceacSegesten and
Markus Bonekamp
 Facebook event httpswwwfacebookcomevents339154760069986


Tuesday 21st of May
Disinformation in Europe
In the age of digitalisation the spreading of misinformation and disinformation is a growing democratic problem In this lecture Oksana Pinsker and Niklas Bernsand are talking about the impact of targeted disinformation on the European elections and how the ukrainian NGO StopFake deals with that problem

 Where  SOL
 When  1915
 Speakers  Oksana Pinsker and Niklas Bernsand
 Facebook event
httpswwwfacebookcomevents291539925109942

Wednesday 22nd of May
Future Alliances in Europe
The future of intergovernmental cooperation within the EU is far from being settled Brexit the continuous rise of populist parties throughout Europe and a geopolitical environment that is challenging from a security perspective cast doubts on the status of the EU as a credible international actor On Wednesday 225 the question of future alliances within the EU will be discussed by staterepresentatives from different member states More detailed information will be released as we get closer to the event

Where  Palaestra
 When  1915
 Speakers  German Ambassador to Sweden more TBD
 Facebook event
httpswwwfacebookcomevents2397435016986498

Thursday 23rd of May
EP Debate w Swedish Party Candidates
Arguably the headline event of the week candidates for the Swedish parties currently in the EP will join us for a debate on what type of future they would like to turn your vote into There will be both a debate and a chance for you to ask questions to the candidates

Where Palaestra
When 18
 Debate  Candidates from Swedish parties currently in the European Parliament
 Facebook event
httpswwwfacebookcomevents466077877292113

Sunday 26th of May
Valvaka  Election watch party at Eden
Arranged by the department for political science with knowledgeable experts providing coverage and information throughout the night

VRSci Fest 2019
VRSci Fest is a unique experiment where technology science and creativity come together to find the best ways of using XReality technologies to benefit people around the world

The theme of the festival this year is SERIOUS GAMES which are designed for a primary purpose other than pure
entertainment but in the collaboration with game industry The serious adjective is generally
prepended to refer to industries like healthcare
city planning engineering and politics

VRSci Fest 2019 program

VR Sci Expo  KTH Biblioteket  May 10  0900  1600

20 VRAR Booths will be presented both from Academia and Industry MITs collaborative Vlearning environment Eye tracking technology from Tobii Pro VARJO  human eyes resolution headset will be presented at Volvo Cars booth Greenmountain Data Center experience by Tieto Artistic project about the Quantum Computer and many many more

VR Sci Talks  KTH Biblioteket  May 10  10001600

VRTalks will bring together some of the leading masterminds of immersive technologies to share their ideas and projects in which science and creativity are intertwined leading us into new experiences new thoughts and new openings

This year we will have three thematic tracks

XR  Industry  1000  1130 Tobii Pro Volvo Cars Vobling Tieto

XR  Education  1130  1400 MIT UCD LTU Sketch AR

XR  Games  1400  1530 RISE IPPD Solution Neat Corporation Really Interactive

VR Sci Films  KTH Biblioteket  May 10  1000  1600

A unique cinema experience with 15 synchronized VR headsets showing the best VR360 degree films about Science and Technology The content is supplied by The Guardian Google Dagens Nyheter and other pioneering of 360VR tech film producers VR Sci Films will also have a collaborative track presented by Institut Fran√ßais de Su√®de

The event is FREE and OPEN for the general public

EveNamn: Live p√• ST√Ö  Stefan Murphy IR
EveBesk:
Live p√• ST√Ö  Stefan Murphy IR
F√ñRK√ñP 150 kr endast 50 biljetter f√∂rst till kvarn F√∂rk√∂psbiljetter kan endast k√∂pas p√• plats p√• ST√Ö Eventuella √∂verblivna biljetter s√§ljs i d√∂rren 200 kr

Stefan Murphy has been making music and putting out albums since 2006 With his first serious project The Mighty Stef he made 4 records and toured the world incessantly from his home base in Dublin Ireland before moving to Berlin in 2015 Whilst in Germany he formed his second wave project Count Vaseline which was more studio than live based churning out two very experimental albums in less than two years Upon moving to the US in 2016 he worked towards taking the CV project on the road He signed to Saustex a Texas based alternative rock n roll label in the spring of 2017 went on a 60 date US tour playing small clubs nationwide and releasing ‚ÄòTales From The Megaplex‚Äô a critically acclaimed slice of DIY punk that was 13mins long in its entirety

Currently he is for the first time touring under his own name playing a fair amount from his back catalog as well as new material from his forthcoming album Stef did a successful european solo tour in January with many sold out shows This time out he will be performing with a band with the sond ranging from Rootsy  Spiritual rock n roll to full on Garage  Soul  His group will be called The Athletes of Soul
The Athletes Of Soul is a concept based on inviting a different backing band or different musicians to play live depending on the region city and in some cases just depending on the show Stef has collaborated with some really inspiring players using this format in the last few years so wanted to put a proper name on it To date members of Black Angels The Germs Ariel Pink The Pogues Reigning Sound Ash Altered Images One Dove Fontaines DC Badlands Republic Of Loose FoxygenHickoids Warbly Jets to name but a small few Athletes of Soul have been a part of the magic

Stefan Murphy In the course of the last decade has shared bills of tours with Jonathan Richman The Fall Black Lips King Khan Alejandro Escovedo Happy Mondays Television Personalities Jeffrey Lewis Dead Boys COOPER Boomtown Rats Rancid The Stooges Queens Of The Stoneage Arcade Fire Libertines and tonnes more if you count festivals etc

EveNamn: Stockholm Yoga and Vegan Mini Festival
EveBesk:
Stockholm Yoga and Vegan Mini Festival
Join Stockholms firstever Yoga and Vegan Festival at the popular events hub Lavalhallen Teachers from different backgrounds and countries are coming together to run sessions at the festival This is a notforprofit event organized to spread awareness about Yoga and veganism

You can participate in Yoga and meditation sessions treat your taste buds to some delicious plantbased foods and drinks prepared by talented chefs of Lavalhallen try henna body art enjoy relaxing massages attend talks on subjects of health and wellbeing including mental health and end the day with fun Bollywood dancing There will also be free Yoga classes for children to make this a perfect family day out Please see below to know the format of the festival

Fee 85 SEK online 100 onthedoor Free for Children

We will have 20 classes at the festival taught by teachers from United Kingdom Sweden and India Each session is priced at only 85 SEK plus booking fee and gives you access to some free workshops as well Yes you heard that right In Stockholm a single Yoga session costs 200 SEK but at our festival you get a Yoga class plus free sessions for only 85 SEK If you buy any single paid class in Room A you get all sessions for free in Area B

You can stay for as long or as little as you like If you want to attend more than one session you are welcome to do that  you just need to buy more tickets Everything can be booked online and you will be guaranteed a space in the class of your choice

Please remember to arrive at least 20 minutes prior to the time of your class The checkin desks will be open all day For example if your class is at 2pm you are welcome to checkin at 10am  we will scan your eticket and give you paper ticket against it You can then and hang out in the stall area attend talks or just chill until your class starts

We request you to bring your own mats If you cant bring a Yoga mat you can bring a Yoga towel as the surface is wooden

Please note that all children below the age of 14 years will get free entry to the festival There will be some sessions exclusively for children Children can also attend the normal Yoga classes with adults We just request you to not leave your children unattended at any time

The details of the Yogameditation sessions ticket sales and a full programme can be accessed here httpswwwyogificorgStockholm

This festival celebrates two ideas that are changing the world for better  Yoga and Veganism Were organizing such festivals all over the world Peace love and compassion for all living beings go vegan in 2019

ROBIN TEKWELUS YOUNGBLOOD
OkanagonTsalagi is a minister teacher author artist and a shamanicpractitionerhealer
She has been a student of her heritage for many years She has learned the sacred teachings of Indigenous elders from her own Native American tribes along with Siberian Polynesian and Aboriginal elders
As a healing practitioner Robin offers Soul Retrieval Aura Cleansing CordCutting Crystal Healing and Soul Readings Robin travels the world offering Workshops Medicine Wheel Constellations and Dance to Heal the Earth as well as facilitating ceremonies such as Sweat Lodge and Vision Quest
Robin is a member of the Seven Generations World Wisdom Council which organizes multicultural Wisdom Gatherings in several countries She is also a member of Grandmothers Circle the Earth and helps establish Grandmother Councils wherever she travels
Since 2012 Robin has circumnavigated the earth three times sharing teachings and ceremonies As a graduate of Barbara Marx Hubbard‚Äôs ‚ÄúAgents of Conscious Evolution‚Äùtraining Robin is a Guide for the Wheel of CoCreation a method of working with others to cocreate sustainable lifestyles that honor Mother Earth and All Our Relations

Varma h√§lsningar
Volont√§rgruppen

You are welcome to apply for being part some time between May 1  Sept 30 We wish that you are willing to stay for at least 4 weeks
During your stay we expect you to take part of the work decided in the volonteer group 6 hours per day from Monday to Friday
In exchange you get a bed to stay in and basic ecological food three times a day seven days a week Weekends you are free to explore the surroundings or travel around if you like
Two volonteers will share a room and the next door kitchen will be shared with other visitors involved in the organization
Together we will be working in a small group sometimes a bigger group with different projects around the retreat place with taking care of the gardens growing vegetables but also renovating buildings and create whatever new is needed Some of the work is inside the main building painting and renovating
There will be plenty of room to connect with and cocreate with others involved with Fridhem and take part of yoga dance meditation drumcircles etc
You are most welcome to share your knowledge experience creative projects during your stay
Stj√§rnsund is surrounded with beautiful nature to rest and explore Please let us know what time you are interested in coming the sooner the better for us to meet your wishes 

Warm regards the volonteer group

Electric Citizen announce UK  EU festival and headlining tour dates for Spring 2019 in support of their recently released third album Helltown RidingEasy Records They kick off the overseas trek with performances at the inaugural Psycho Smokeout Festival in Los Angeles on April 20th and DesertFest in Brooklyn NY on April 27th

Going from one rifffilled masterpiece to the next Electric Citizen go well beyond anything that they accomplished with 2014s Sateen The band is coming into their own and they know it  Metal Injection

Electric Citizens greasy pop hooks come buried under layers of swaggering stoner licks hot rock leads and vocalist Laura Dolans sinewy yowl keeping things good and dirty even as they let a little sparkle peek out  Noisey

With songs this good they deserve to blow up  Consequence of Sound

httpsdailybandcampcom20181005electriccitizenhelltownreview

Helltown the third album by Electric Citizen is in many ways a homecoming While the title may seem fittingly metal if not exceedingly so it actually has real relevance Helltown all one word while also multidimensional is named after the Cincinnati OH neighborhood in which the band lives practices and where the album was written recorded and mixed Now known more prosaically as Northside Helltown earned its name in the 1800s due to its reputation for rowdy taverns frequented by the neighborhood of factory workers and immigrants

Inasmuch as Helltown is an ode to the bands home and its buried past it also represents a return to the grittier sound of their 2014 debut Sateen Furthermore it marks the return of original bassist Nick Vogelpohl who rejoins vocalist Laura Dolan guitarist Ross Dolan and drummer Nate Wagner Its a fun tough dirty rock n roll album

Ashtangaretreat i Stockholms sk√§rg√•rd
YogaShala Blid√∂ is a newly built yoga house with 13 windows overlooking beautiful nature in Stockholms archipelago We live a 2 minute walk from the ocean in small classical Swedish summer houses and we eat organic vegetarianvegan meals

This retreat is a great introduction if youre new to Ashtanga yoga and want to learn the fundamentals of the practice together with a teacher with over 10 years of regular yoga practice and 5 years of teaching

During this weekend course well go through
 Ashtanga Yoga Half Primary Series ledd class
 Asana Workshop looking at key postures  transitions
 Intro to Meditation  regular morning meditation practice
 Pranayama breathing techniques
 Yoga Philosophy  theory
 Intro to Mysore Style Ashtanga  selfpractice

Yoga retreat includes
 6 classes
 2 nights accommodation shared
 All meals including snackscoffeete during day
 Yoga mats props writing blocks etc are all provided at the retreat cewnter

Yoga teacher
With a background in music Sofia started practicing yoga at the age of 13 She did her first yoga teacher training in India after graduating school at 19 years old Since then practicing and teaching yoga has been a huge part of her life Today Sofia is a dedicated Ashtanga yoga practitioner and been practicing with numbers of well known Ashtanga teachers including Sharath Jois at KPJAYI in Mysore India Sofias been teaching workshops and retreats in different parts of the world The past 5 years shes been teaching regular classes in Stockholm and hosted two Mysoreyogaprograms

There is max 8 spots on this retreat 3 left

Lineup May 10th

BOLD US
Formed in 1985 by four disaffected thirteen year olds BOLD began life as Crippled Youth The band first caught the attention of the thriving mid80‚Äôs hardcore scene with the release of their nine song ep ‚ÄúJoin The Fight‚Äù which along with brother band Youth of Today helped define the look message and sound of what would become known as Youth Crew hardcore Shortly after the release of ‚ÄúJoin The Fight‚Äù the band changed its name and released the landmark NYHC LP ‚ÄúSpeak Out‚Äù on Revelation Records Nonstop live shows expanded the band‚Äôs reach and cemented them among the most influential groups of their time In 1989 BOLD recruited guitarist Tom Capone for the release of what would become at its time their swan song  the eponymous 7‚Äù which would later be rereleased as Looking Back This record marked a distinct sonic and lyrical progression anticipating the more technical components of what would follow in hardcore of the 90‚Äôs while at the same time prefiguring many hallmarks of what would soon inform posthardcore Since 2005 the band have performed off and on throughout The US Europe and the Far East

High Reeper US
Formed in 2016 High Reeper is made up of Zach Thomas Justin Di Pinto Andrew Price Pat Daly and Shane Trimble Originally started as just a studio band it rapidly became apparent that these songs were meant to be heard live and loud
The band made their debut in the PhillyDE stoner rock scene in early 2017 with success which was followed up by the recording of their selftitled debut in May With a sound deeply rooted in modern stoner rock while still giving a nod to the earliest Sabbath records High Reepers first offering is driven by pounding rhythms thick guitars and soaring screeching vocals
For their second record the addition of Di Pinto on drums helped focus their sound in an even more powerful direction The result is a new record with riffs that are even heavier than before that explore new directions including the ballad ‚ÄúApocalypse Hymn‚Äù
After a successful 2018 European tour that included Desertfest Berlin High Reeper Will once again tour Europe in 2019 visiting ten countries as well as an appearance at Desertfest London

HAG MALM√ñ
Some would say that they are breathtaking I say they are breathgiving
Hag had me moshing headbanging and dancing more than any other I can think of
Raw n nasty in your face punk like no other HAG will mos def run you over a hundred times harder than any bulldozer ever would
Therefor it‚Äôs with my greatest pleasure to announce that HAG will play Reefer Sadness Fest 2

THE HYPNAGOGICS KRISTIANSTAD
Striking lightning rock n roll with stoner tendencies
With influences from the classic heroes of ROCK The Hypnagogics put their own seasoning with some heavy groove and darkness on to the masterpieces they create If you havent seen them yet youre up for a treat and if you have seen the before youre still up for a treat

Lineup May 11th

Domkraft Sthlm

Bonding over the likes of Spacemen 3 Monster Magnet Sleep and Hawkwind plus a fascination with trudging 10minute epics bassistsinger Martin Wegeland guitarist Martin Widholm and drummer Anders Dahlgren came together in Stockholm after playing in various musical constellations
Drawing from the heaviest of their combined influences the three crafted a sound that blends towering dirges mindbending psychedelia and hypnotic minimalism and selfreleased their monolithic selftitled EP in 2015
Debut fulllength The End of Electricity followed in 2016 on Magnetic Eye Records landing on numerous endofyear lists and leading to 2017 festival slots at Desertfest Berlin and Psycho Las Vegas
Sophomore LP Flood was released Oct 19 2018 on Blues Funeral Recordings to critical acclaim including an 810 from Metal Hammer 8510 from Rock Hard 810 from Deaf Forever and a Doom Charts appearance at 4 behind only Windhand
Uncle Acid and High on Fire
The band also provided tracks for Magnetic Eye‚Äôs Pink Floyd Redux albums alongside Scott Reeder ASG Pallbearer and The Melvins
Domkraft has performed at Desertfest Belgium and Berlin Blow Up in Helsinki Northern Discomfort in Copenhagen Psycho Las Vegas Hostsabbat in Oslo and Fall of Man in Munich and has supported bands like Boris Monolord and Bell Witch

I digress The band made their selftitled debut in 2015 via Heavy Psych Sounds and it‚Äôs worth noting they‚Äôre not really out of place on either label Still from the quote below it‚Äôs pretty plain they‚Äôre stoked to be working with Black Bow and yeah they should be That record was also four songs of megastomping doom so it‚Äôs nice to see they‚Äôre keeping to form with the new one Not that I‚Äôve heard it yet or anything but it‚Äôs bludgeoning

Workshop  Open your wings
Your wings exist It is time to open them and dare to jump even though you do not know where you will land

This workshop will empower you to believe in your body and explore space in all directions including upsidedown This day is all about you It is about you exploring space within you as well as outside your body You will feel connection to earth space and your breath

Agenda
1200 Intro
1215 1330 AntiGravity Suspension Fitness with focus on flips and tricks and flying trough space
1345 1515 Intro to Acro Yoga
15151535 Break
1535 ‚Äì 1700 AntiGravity Aerial Yoga with focus on vinyasas and flowing through space
1700 Summing up

Time 12001715

Place Homie Fitness Skeppargatan 28 114 52 Stockholm

Level Intermediate

Requirements Frequent flyer ‚Äì have experienced our AntiGravity¬Æ Fundamentals classes on a regular basis

And a little more about the content of the day

If you would like to know more about AntiGravity Suspension Fitness please check this out httpantigravityfitnessseklasserantigravitysuspensionfitness

Intro to AcroYoga
A floorbased technique AcroYoga blends the wisdom of yoga dynamic power of acrobatics and loving kindness of Thai Yoga Bodywork Working in duos and trios take partner work to new levels of empowerment community and play all the while stretching and strengthening the body in ways sure to send you home in bliss Expect a short yoga flow bodyweight conditioning and partner stretching as well Open to all levels No need to come with a partner as we will all be working together

If you would like to know more about AntiGravity Aerial Yoga please check this out httpantigravityfitnessseklasserantigravityaerialyoga

And a little more about us

Josie is a Master Instructor Trainer for AntiGravity¬Æ Fitness and Program Director for AntiGravity¬Æ Restorative Yoga and Aerial Yoga working directly with founder and mentorinflight Christopher Harrison She is also a certified instructor in AcroYoga AcroFit Vinyasa Yoga Yoga Nidra Restorative Yoga Thai Yoga Bodywork Grounded Aerial Bungee The Ring Thing Mat Pilates and Yoga Tune Up Therapy Ball Practitioner Josie continues to expand on her love of yoga dance and aerial arts in her Invert Every Day project When not teaching or performing Josie is most likely to be found training handstands or photographing the best in live music ‚ÄúUpside down is right side up and ice cream makes everything better‚Äù

‚ÄùOpen your wings and fly‚Äù Isabella is passionate about 3 things in life AntiGravity¬Æ meeting people and to dance She loves to share her passion and energy Since 2005 she inspires her participats to dare to jump without knowing where they will land She believes that we all will be happier through listening within and follow our heart‚Äôs path When she is not training new instructors in AntiGravity or teaching classes in AntiGravity¬Æ Isabella is working within her company Wings by Bella With her daily work in project management and as group fitness instructor  yoga teacher she is reaching new hights together with the people surrounding her

All this for 850 inkl snacks and tea

To sign up please email helloantigravityfitnessse

After a year‚Äôs interruption one of the oldest traditions in Lund is finally back to challenge the students it‚Äôs time for the Tandem Relay Race 2019 On the 10th of May one thousand students from various nations and student unions will head to Gothenburg in around thirty busses for an unforgettable weekend In Gothenburg we‚Äôll start the greatest race you can imagine from Gothenburg to Lund on a tandem bicycle And while you cycle the party will continue on the buss where you can also expect a few ‚Äúdiscostops‚Äù along the way where all the buses meet for an epic outdoor party

Kalmar Nation will of course participate with its own bus but in order to have a chance to win we need a team of brave participants That‚Äôs why we are now opening the signup for our team through the link httpsgooglformsHuuInMU3lpg3NezX2
